setup_script_description: sets focus on a link before the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
specific_user_instruction: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link.
output_assertions: Role of the landmark region, 'navigation', is conveyed
Name of the landmark region, 'Breadcrumb', is conveyed
'Role of the breadcrumbs container, 'list', is conveyed
Number of list items, 4, is conveyed
